dbQuery.query: select distinct s.route_id,s.begin_date,to_char(s.begin_date,'YYYY')||' год. '||rt.description||' '||l.description||', '||c.station_begin||' - '||c.station_end||' км.' layer_name,l.description,rt.description FROM web50.waterway_cross_station_point s,web50.waterway_cross c,pods.route r,pods.line l,pods.route_type_cl rt where c.zone_id={ZONE_ID} and s.waterway_cross_id=c.waterway_cross_id and s.route_id=r.route_id and r.line_id=l.line_id and rt.code=r.type_cl order by l.description,rt.description,s.begin_date
SELECT * FROM (SELECT LINE_ID ID, t.* FROM WEB50.LINE t) d WHERE {FILTER}

select * from ( select {START_KM} abs_measure union all select max(ddd.abs_measure) from (select {START_KM}+max(s.measure/1000)-min(s.measure/1000) abs_measure FROM web50.waterway_cross_station_point s,web50.waterway_cross c where c.zone_id={ZONE_ID} and s.waterway_cross_id=c.waterway_cross_id group by c.waterway_cross_id) ddd ) dd order by dd.abs_measure
